verses.verse: Now these are the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> that went up<WH5927> with Zerubbabel<WH2216> the son<WH1121> of Shealtiel<WH7597>, and Jeshua<WH3442>: Seraiah<WH8304>, Jeremiah<WH3414>, Ezra<WH5830>,
Amariah<WH568>, Malluch<WH4409>, Hattush<WH2407>, Malluch: or, Melicu
Shechaniah<WH7935>, Rehum<WH7348>, Meremoth<WH4822>, Shechaniah: or, Shebaniah Rehum: or, Harim Meremoth: or, Meraioth
Iddo<WH5714>, Ginnetho<WH1599>, Abijah<WH29>, Ginnetho: or, Ginnethon
Miamin<WH4326>, Maadiah<WH4573>, Bilgah<WH1083>, Miamin: or, Miniamin Maadiah: or, Moadiah
Shemaiah<WH8098>, and Joiarib<WH3114>, Jedaiah<WH3048>,

Sallu<WH5543>, Amok<WH5987>, Hilkiah<WH2518>, Jedaiah<WH3048>. These were the chief<WH7218> of the priests<WH3548> and of their brethren<WH251> in the days<WH3117> of Jeshua<WH3442>. Sallu: or, Sallai

Moreover the Levites<WH3881>: Jeshua<WH3442>, Binnui<WH1131>, Kadmiel<WH6934>, Sherebiah<WH8274>, Judah<WH3063>, and Mattaniah<WH4983>, which was over the thanksgiving<WH1960>, he and his brethren<WH251>. the thanksgiving: that is, the psalms of thanksgiving
Also Bakbukiah<WH1229> and Unni<WH6042>, their brethren<WH251>, were over against them in the watches<WH4931>.
And Jeshua<WH3442> begat<WH3205> Joiakim<WH3113>, Joiakim<WH3113> also begat<WH3205> Eliashib<WH475>, and Eliashib<WH475> begat<WH3205> Joiada<WH3111>,
And Joiada<WH3111> begat<WH3205> Jonathan<WH3129>, and Jonathan<WH3129> begat<WH3205> Jaddua<WH3037>.
And in the days<WH3117> of Joiakim<WH3113> were priests<WH3548>, the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>: of Seraiah<WH8304>, Meraiah<WH4811>; of Jeremiah<WH3414>, Hananiah<WH2608>;
Of Ezra<WH5830>, Meshullam<WH4918>; of Amariah<WH568>, Jehohanan<WH3076>;
Of Melicu<WH4409>, Jonathan<WH3129>; of Shebaniah<WH7645>, Joseph<WH3130>;
Of Harim<WH2766>, Adna<WH5733>; of Meraioth<WH4812>, Helkai<WH2517>;
Of Iddo<WH5714>, Zechariah<WH2148>; of Ginnethon<WH1599>, Meshullam<WH4918>;
Of Abijah<WH29>, Zichri<WH2147>; of Miniamin<WH4509>, of Moadiah<WH4153>, Piltai<WH6408>;
Of Bilgah<WH1083>, Shammua<WH8051>; of Shemaiah<WH8098>, Jehonathan<WH3083>;
And of Joiarib<WH3114>, Mattenai<WH4982>; of Jedaiah<WH3048>, Uzzi<WH5813>;
Of Sallai<WH5543>, Kallai<WH7040>; of Amok<WH5987>, Eber<WH5677>;
Of Hilkiah<WH2518>, Hashabiah<WH2811>; of Jedaiah<WH3048>, Nethaneel<WH5417>.

The Levites<WH3881> in the days<WH3117> of Eliashib<WH475>, Joiada<WH3111>, and Johanan<WH3110>, and Jaddua<WH3037>, were recorded<WH3789> chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>: also the priests<WH3548>, to the reign<WH4438> of Darius<WH1867> the Persian<WH6542>.

The sons<WH1121> of Levi<WH3878>, the chief<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>, were written<WH3789> in the book<WH5612> of the chronicles<WH1697>, even until the days<WH3117> of Johanan<WH3110> the son<WH1121> of Eliashib<WH475>.

And the chief<WH7218> of the Levites<WH3881>: Hashabiah<WH2811>, Sherebiah<WH8274>, and Jeshua<WH3442> the son<WH1121> of Kadmiel<WH6934>, with their brethren<WH251> over against them, to praise<WH1984> and to give thanks<WH3034>, according to the commandment<WH4687> of David<WH1732> the man<WH376> of God<WH430>, ward<WH4929> over against<WH5980> ward<WH4929>.

Mattaniah<WH4983>, and Bakbukiah<WH1229>, Obadiah<WH5662>, Meshullam<WH4918>, Talmon<WH2929>, Akkub<WH6126>, were porters<WH7778> keeping<WH8104> the ward<WH4929> at the thresholds<WH624> of the gates<WH8179>. thresholds: or, treasuries, or, assemblies

These were in the days<WH3117> of Joiakim<WH3113> the son<WH1121> of Jeshua<WH3442>, the son<WH1121> of Jozadak<WH3136>, and in the days<WH3117> of Nehemiah<WH5166> the governor<WH6346>, and of Ezra<WH5830> the priest<WH3548>, the scribe<WH5608>.

And at the dedication<WH2598> of the wall<WH2346> of Jerusalem<WH3389> they sought<WH1245> the Levites<WH3881> out of all their places<WH4725>, to bring<WH935> them to Jerusalem<WH3389>, to keep<WH6213> the dedication<WH2598> with gladness<WH8057>, both with thanksgivings<WH8426>, and with singing<WH7892>, with cymbals<WH4700>, psalteries<WH5035>, and with harps<WH3658>.

And the sons<WH1121> of the singers<WH7891> gathered themselves together<WH622>, both out of the plain country<WH3603> round about<WH5439> Jerusalem<WH3389>, and from the villages<WH2691> of Netophathi<WH5200>;

Also from the house<WH1004> of Gilgal<WH1537> <WH1019>, and out of the fields<WH7704> of Geba<WH1387> and Azmaveth<WH5820>: for the singers<WH7891> had builded<WH1129> them villages<WH2691> round about<WH5439> Jerusalem<WH3389>.
And the priests<WH3548> and the Levites<WH3881> purified<WH2891> themselves, and purified<WH2891> the people<WH5971>, and the gates<WH8179>, and the wall<WH2346>.

Then I brought up<WH5927> the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063> upon the wall<WH2346>, and appointed<WH5975> two<WH8147> great<WH1419> companies of them that gave thanks<WH8426>, whereof one went<WH8418> on the right hand<WH3225> upon the wall<WH2346> toward the dung<WH830> gate<WH8179>:
And after<WH310> them went<WH3212> Hoshaiah<WH1955>, and half<WH2677> of the princes<WH8269> of Judah<WH3063>,
And Azariah<WH5838>, Ezra<WH5830>, and Meshullam<WH4918>,
Judah<WH3063>, and Benjamin<WH1144>, and Shemaiah<WH8098>, and Jeremiah<WH3414>,

And certain of the priests'<WH3548> sons<WH1121> with trumpets<WH2689>; namely, Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3129>, the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah<WH8098>, the son<WH1121> of Mattaniah<WH4983>, the son<WH1121> of Michaiah<WH4320>, the son<WH1121> of Zaccur<WH2139>, the son<WH1121> of Asaph<WH623>:

And his brethren<WH251>, Shemaiah<WH8098>, and Azarael<WH5832>, Milalai<WH4450>, Gilalai<WH1562>, Maai<WH4597>, Nethaneel<WH5417>, and Judah<WH3063>, Hanani<WH2607>, with the musical<WH7892> instruments<WH3627> of David<WH1732> the man<WH376> of God<WH430>, and Ezra<WH5830> the scribe<WH5608> before<WH6440> them.

And at the fountain<WH5869> gate<WH8179>, which was over against them, they went up<WH5927> by the stairs<WH4609> of the city<WH5892> of David<WH1732>, at the going up<WH4608> of the wall<WH2346>, above the house<WH1004> of David<WH1732>, even unto the water<WH4325> gate<WH8179> eastward<WH4217>.

And the other<WH8145> company of them that gave thanks<WH8426> went<WH1980> over against<WH4136> them, and I after<WH310> them, and the half<WH2677> of the people<WH5971> upon the wall<WH2346>, from beyond the tower<WH4026> of the furnaces<WH8574> even unto the broad<WH7342> wall<WH2346>;

And from above the gate<WH8179> of Ephraim<WH669>, and above the old<WH3465> gate<WH8179>, and above the fish<WH1709> gate<WH8179>, and the tower<WH4026> of Hananeel<WH2606>, and the tower<WH4026> of Meah<WH3968>, even unto the sheep<WH6629> gate<WH8179>: and they stood still<WH5975> in the prison<WH4307> gate<WH8179>.
So stood<WH5975> the two<WH8147> companies of them that gave thanks<WH8426> in the house<WH1004> of God<WH430>, and I, and the half<WH2677> of the rulers<WH5461> with me:
And the priests<WH3548>; Eliakim<WH471>, Maaseiah<WH4641>, Miniamin<WH4509>, Michaiah<WH4320>, Elioenai<WH454>, Zechariah<WH2148>, and Hananiah<WH2608>, with trumpets<WH2689>;

And Maaseiah<WH4641>, and Shemaiah<WH8098>, and Eleazar<WH499>, and Uzzi<WH5813>, and Jehohanan<WH3076>, and Malchijah<WH4441>, and Elam<WH5867>, and Ezer<WH5829>. And the singers<WH7891> sang loud<WH8085>, with Jezrahiah<WH3156> their overseer<WH6496>. sang: Heb. made their voice to be heard

Also that day<WH3117> they offered<WH2076> great<WH1419> sacrifices<WH2077>, and rejoiced<WH8055>: for God<WH430> had made them rejoice<WH8055> with great<WH1419> joy<WH8057>: the wives<WH802> also and the children<WH3206> rejoiced<WH8055>: so that the joy<WH8057> of Jerusalem<WH3389> was heard<WH8085> even afar off<WH7350>.

And at that time<WH3117> were some<WH582> appointed<WH6485> over the chambers<WH5393> for the treasures<WH214>, for the offerings<WH8641>, for the firstfruits<WH7225>, and for the tithes<WH4643>, to gather<WH3664> into them out of the fields<WH7704> of the cities<WH5892> the portions<WH4521> of the law<WH8451> for the priests<WH3548> and Levites<WH3881>: for Judah<WH3063> rejoiced<WH8057> for the priests<WH3548> and for the Levites<WH3881> that waited<WH5975>. of the law: that is, appointed by the law for Judah: Heb. for the joy of Judah waited: Heb. stood

And both the singers<WH7891> and the porters<WH7778> kept<WH8104> the ward<WH4931> of their God<WH430>, and the ward<WH4931> of the purification<WH2893>, according to the commandment<WH4687> of David<WH1732>, and of Solomon<WH8010> his son<WH1121>.
For in the days<WH3117> of David<WH1732> and Asaph<WH623> of old<WH6924> there were chief<WH7218> of the singers<WH7891>, and songs<WH7892> of praise<WH8416> and thanksgiving<WH3034> unto God<WH430>.

And all Israel<WH3478> in the days<WH3117> of Zerubbabel<WH2216>, and in the days<WH3117> of Nehemiah<WH5166>, gave<WH5414> the portions<WH4521> of the singers<WH7891> and the porters<WH7778>, every day<WH3117> his portion<WH1697>: and they sanctified<WH6942> holy things unto the Levites<WH3881>; and the Levites<WH3881> sanctified<WH6942> them unto the children<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175>. sanctified: that is, set apart
